If you enjoy overwhelming hopelessness and impending suffering, like Berserk, then the manga for Bokurano is a definite recommendation. It's also the only manga I've enjoyed more than Berserk, if that's worth anything.
Shamo is arguably similar since both MC's (Guts and the dude-from-Shamo) are pretty fucked up and neither series pulls any punches.

Thanks for the heads up! Unfortunately, I already payed last night, but will keep this in mind for the future.
